p: Similarly, the standardized incidence rates of confirmed/probable COVID-19 cases were 136 (95% CI 78–193) cases per 10000 PLWH and 417 (417–417) cases per 10 000 Barcelona inhabitants. The standardized incidence rate ratio was 0.33 (95% CI 0.21–0.50, P < 0.0001), which means that confirmed/probable COVID-19 cases in the PLWH cohort were 67% lower than those in Barcelona.
